description: The file contains the meta data of queer text

queers.statement2: Cold light big city winter nights between houses even cats freeze
There is a black cat across the road where I went unfortunate for it
A sunny morning the birds fly by a cat gets up
Bizarre cats dancing belly dance on me Kloe'r screaming tonight
I'm going for a walk meet no wildlife just a striped cat
In the dark night meet cats in the yard then there is a concert
The sun is high heaven and in the ditch lies a dead cat
Cats in quantities prepared by the garden door the claws are sharpened
On cat paws The night spun in tar out on scratches
